main.name: raky
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rakesh! You might also know me as devmanush raky. I've been coding for over 2 months now. As a student I've not work with any startup and large corporations.Few months ago my friend tell me about react sp i join your live sessions and Challenges ,Iam trying to learn ReactJs and want to be a full stack devloper this is my goal and I am sure you will help me Sonny .Thank you for your Attention
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: Student of Sonny
work.description: Want to be a Full Stack Devloper. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
